description: Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and production of oil and gas reserves in Canada and the United States. The company has an option to acquire 75% working interest in West Hazel field, a petroleum asset located in the Western Canadian Sedimentary Basin, Saskatchewan. It also focuses on the development and commercialization of clean energy technology in Canada and Europe. The company was formerly known as Hillcrest Petroleum Ltd. and changed its name to Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd. in April 2021. Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
